Subject: hotfix 1.1 not being applied
Description:
Hello,
 
Based on email alerts, I had applied the available hotfixes over the last 2 weeks.
 
Most recently, I applied hotfix 1.1 on Monday and on screen notification said update applied successfully.
 
I noticed today that hotfix 1.1 was still being listed as an available update.
